text: Marianne Verville (born 28 May 1994) is an actress from Saint-Lambert, Quebec. She is Pierre Verville's daughter. She is known for her role as "Aurélie Laflamme" in the movie adaptations of the novels, Le Journal d'Aurélie Laflamme, by India Desjardins. She has also participated with her father in an advertisement for Le Lait. She played the role of Violette in Mauvais Karma show at Radio-Canada. == Filmography == === Movies === * 2008 : J’ai tué ma mère (Student) * 2010 : Le Journal d'Aurélie Laflamme (Aurélie Laflamme) * 2012 : 22h20, Heure de l’Est (Anne) * 2015 : Aurélie Laflamme - Les pieds sur terre (Aurélie Laflamme) === Television === * 2010 - 2012 : Mauvais Karma (Violette) * 2011 : Amanda (Amanda) * 2012 - 2013 : Tactik (Marjorie) (5th & 6th seasons) * 2016: District 31 (Melissa) ==References== == Other websites == * on the Internet Movie Database Category:Actors from Quebec Category:1994 births Category:Living people
title: Marianne Verville
